meanings.definition: A curtain or screen used to divide a room or space.
meanings.sent1: I closed the cortina to block the sunlight from entering the room.
meanings.sent2: The cortina in the living room matched the color of the sofa.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the cortina and ended up tangled in the fabric.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed behind the cortina, adding a sense of mystery to the room.
meanings.sent5: As the wind blew through the cortina, it danced gracefully like a ballerina.
